subject: Stanley Cup
Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: The Canadiens and the Rangers, teams with long Stanley Cup droughts, face off in the Eastern Conference Finals, while the Blackhawks and Kings battle for more success in the Western finals.
snippet: The Canadiens and the Rangers, teams with long Stanley Cup droughts, face off in the Eastern Conference Finals, while the Blackhawks and Kings battle for more success in the Western finals.
